title: We NEED a new SEXY CHICK CHAMPION
body:
Since the release of Nami,Vi back in 2012, there hasn't been any new cute/sexy/attractive female champions.

Thresh
Quinn (She's more masculine than most of the male champs)
Zac
Lissandra (a grandma)
Aatrox
Lucian
Jinx (nope)
Yasuo
Vel'Koz
Braum
Gnar
Azir
Kalista (like Jinx)
Rek'Sai (hahahaha)
Ekko
Tahm Kench

Where the boobs at? Us men have needs, please Riot please.

replies.body: If you have needs I suggest you to leave the basement once in a while.
A grandma ? Lissandra is the sexiest champ ever made eat your brain

We need an attractive guy champion, there is not a single attractive male champion.

Atleast the guys get attractive champs.
Girls just get steroid garbage, hairy beast men and gay centeral.

Yeah, but 90% of females find those types of bodies are actually disgusting. Plus, they're so feminine, what girl wants a chick?
They must be more targeted towards leagues gay male audience.

>Lissandra (a grandma)

And no, sorry we're not all perverts like you.
We need a hedgehog champion.. one that can go too fast even for Rammus and Heca, even for  Rek's ultimate.
If you have needs, I prefer you go and masturbate elsewhere than in a league game. Some of us want to win.
Um they made braum... Have you seen that walking pile of godlike muscle.
Yeah I probobly shouldn't say this but we need sexy champs!!! BIG boobs BIG ones literally naked

You're acting like a boob.

Also good for your grandma if she can pull off the Bloodstone Lissandra look.
I support you! and Im gay! so its not because of the boobs...whats the problem with a champion who is confident on her sensuality? and like to show off?
Done and done. Rito, take this comment literally and create a sexy bird. NOW.
